OrderedItems.description: A rdf:List variant for Objects and Links
OrderedItems.label: OrderedItems

Activity.description: An Object representing some form of Action that has been taken
Activity.label: Activity

Add.description: To Add an Object or Link to Something
Add.label: Add

Announce.description: Actor announces the object to the target
Announce.label: Announce

Application.description: Represents a software application of any sort
Application.label: Application

Arrive.description: To Arrive Somewhere (can be used, for instance, to indicate that a particular entity is currently located somewhere, e.g. a "check-in")
Arrive.label: Arrive

IntransitiveActivity.description: An Activity that has no direct object
IntransitiveActivity.label: IntransitiveActivity

Article.description: A written work. Typically several paragraphs long. For example, a blog post or a news article.
Article.label: Article

Document.description: Represents a digital document/file of any sort
Document.label: Document

Collection.description: An ordered or unordered collection of Objects or Links
Collection.label: Collection

CollectionPage.description: A subset of items from a Collection
CollectionPage.label: CollectionPage

Flag.description: To flag something (e.g. flag as inappropriate, flag as spam, etc)
Flag.label: Flag

Invite.description: To invite someone or something to something
Invite.label: Invite

Offer.description: To Offer something to someone or something
Offer.label: Offer

Link.description: Represents a qualified reference to another resource. Patterned after the RFC5988 Web Linking Model
Link.label: Link

Listen.description: The actor listened to the object
Listen.label: Listen

Mention.description: A specialized Link that represents an @mention
Mention.label: Mention

Move.description: The actor is moving the object. The target specifies where the object is moving to. The origin specifies where the object is moving from.
Move.label: Move

Note.description: A Short note, typically less than a single paragraph. A "tweet" is an example, or a "status update"
Note.label: Note

OrderedCollection.description: A variation of Collection in which items are strictly ordered
OrderedCollection.label: OrderedCollection

OrderedCollectionPage.description: An ordered subset of items from an OrderedCollection
OrderedCollectionPage.label: OrderedCollectionPage

Relationship.description: Represents a Social Graph relationship between two Individuals (indicated by the 'a' and 'b' properties)
Relationship.label: Relationship

Service.description: A service provided by some entity
Service.label: Service

Tombstone.description: A placeholder for a deleted object
Tombstone.label: Tombstone

Travel.description: The actor is traveling to the target. The origin specifies where the actor is traveling from.
Travel.label: Travel

Undo.description: To Undo Something. This would typically be used to indicate that a previous Activity has been undone.
Undo.label: Undo

Video.description: A Video document of any kind.
Video.label: Video

accuracy.description: Specifies the accuracy around the point established by the longitude and latitude
accuracy.label: accuracy

deleted.description: Specifies the date and time the object was deleted
deleted.label: deleted

endTime.description: The ending time of the object
endTime.label: endTime

height.description: The display height expressed as device independent pixels
height.label: height

href.description: The target URI of the Link
href.label: href

hreflang.description: A hint about the language of the referenced resource
hreflang.label: hreflang

published.description: Specifies the date and time the object was published
published.label: published

radius.description: Specifies a radius around the point established by the longitude and latitude
radius.label: radius

rating.description: A numeric rating (>= 0.0, <= 5.0) for the object
rating.label: rating

rel.description: The RFC 5988 or HTML5 Link Relation associated with the Link
rel.label: rel

startIndex.description: In a strictly ordered logical collection, specifies the index position of the first item in the items list
startIndex.label: startIndex

startTime.description: The starting time of the object
startTime.label: startTime

summary.description: A short summary of the object
summary.label: summary

totalItems.description: The total number of items in a logical collection
totalItems.label: totalItems

units.description: Identifies the unit of measurement used by the radius, altitude and accuracy properties. The value can be expressed either as one of a set of predefined units or as a well-known common URI that identifies units.
units.label: units

updated.description: Specifies when the object was last updated
updated.label: updated

width.description: Specifies the preferred display width of the content, expressed in terms of device independent pixels.
width.label: width

actor.description: Subproperty of as:attributedTo that identifies the primary actor
actor.label: actor

attributedTo.description: Identifies an entity to which an object is attributed
attributedTo.label: attributedTo

anyOf.description: Describes a possible inclusive answer or option for a question.
anyOf.label: oneOf

author.description: Identifies the author of an object. Deprecated. Use as:attributedTo instead
author.label: author

context.description: Specifies the context within which an object exists or an activity was performed
context.label: context

describes.description: On a Profile object, describes the object described by the profile
describes.label: describes

formerType.description: On a Tombstone object, describes the former type of the deleted object
formerType.label: formerType

instrument.description: Indentifies an object used (or to be used) to complete an activity
instrument.label: instrument

oneOf.description: Describes a possible exclusive answer or option for a question.
oneOf.label: oneOf

origin.description: For certain activities, specifies the entity from which the action is directed.
origin.label: origin

relationship.description: On a Relationship object, describes the type of relationship
relationship.label: relationship

subject.description: On a Relationship object, identifies the subject. e.g. when saying "John is connected to Sally", 'subject' refers to 'John'
subject.label: a

url.description: Specifies a link to a specific representation of the Object
url.label: url
